statement.name: INSERT_SMAPNB
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMAPNB(NROPNB, NROQNT, PRSBKO, EMLBKO, FCHPNB, FHVPNB, STDPNB, FILPNB,SQLBKR,CODPRS) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?)

statement.name: UPDATE_SMAPNB
statement.sql: UPDATE SMAPNB SET NROQNT=?, PRSBKO=?, EMLBKO=?, FCHPNB=?, FHVPNB=?, STDPNB=?, FILPNB=?,SQLBKR=? WHERE NROPNB=?

statement.name: INSERT_SMAPNT
statement.sql: INSERT INTO SMAPNT(NROPNT,NROPNB,TPOPNT ,PINPNT,VLRPNT,NROPQK, NRORBR, BGNPIN,ENDPIN ,SQLBKR) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?)
